pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Dissimilarity Matrix for Dataset with Mixed Attributes // Implement the methods proposed by Ahmad Dey (2007) doi:10.1016/j.datak.2007.03.016 in calculating the dissimilarity matrix at the presence of mixed attributes. This Package includes functions to discretize quantitative variables, calculate conditional probability for each pair of attribute values, distance between every pair of attribute values, significance of attributes, calculate dissimilarity between each pair of objects.
